segments.text: Your garden is looking very beautiful this summer . The flowers are really colorful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . I have roses , tulips , and daffodils . Do you like the rockery with the smaller flowers ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I do . Those are violets , aren ’ t they ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , they are . This afternoon , I ’ m going to prune the hedge .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The lower branches on that tree are hanging very low . Would you like me to cut them off for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you ! That would be very kind of you . I have a saw in the garden shed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When the lower branches are removed , you ’ ll be able to sit under the tree .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tomorrow , I ’ ll cut the grass . Then the garden will look perfect .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just make sure children don ’ t play in the flower beds and destroy the flowers .
segments.speaker: S1
